about_the_game:
This is the PDF version of the official NeverAwake art book.
39 pages, all in full color, by YUIKO TSUGAWA, the illustrator of the game!
The book contains a lot of setting materials for each character and stage.
Please enjoy NeverAwake's unique world view expressed by hand-drawing.


HOW TO ACCESS BONUS CONTENT
The digital bonuses are kept in a folder called "NeverAwake - Nightmare World Art", within the folder that you installed the game to.

You can access the content with the following steps:
1. Right-click the game in your Steam Library, then select Properties.
2. On the Local Files tab, select Browse.
